alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 18 at 12:27PM EDT until April 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Dry conditions and gusty winds will create an enhanced risk for wildfire ignition and spread Today... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, GUSTY WINDS, AND DRY FUELS FOR SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA, AND PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN, CENTRAL, AND EASTERN WEST VIRGINIA... * Timing...Thus afternoon through this evening. * Winds...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 24 percent. * Temperatures...In the upper 50s. * Lightning...None. * Impacts...Enhanced risk of wildfire ignition and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...dry fuels and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
